# isReady

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the reader session is started and ready to use.

## Declaration

```swift
var isReady: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

As soon as a reader session is successfully activated, radio-frequency discovery polling begins. When a tag is detected, [doc://com.apple.corenfc/documentation/CoreNFC/NFCReaderSessionDelegate/readerSession:didDetectTags:] is called.
title: isReady
